workflow.meta: 发行实施相关审批流程

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where GPLX = 3 and id = ? and KPJD=111",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where SFWCXC = 3 and id = ? and KPJD in (112,113,114)",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC])

cnt==1&&(cnt1==1||cnt2==1);

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where GPLX = 3 and id = ? and KPJD=111",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where SFWCXC = 3 and id = ? and KPJD in (112,113,114)",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC])

cnt==1&&(cnt1==1||cnt2==1);

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
var cnt1=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where GPLX = 3 and id = ? and KPJD=111",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC]);
var cnt2=ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMXX_XSB where SFWCXC = 3 and id = ? and KPJD in (112,113,114)",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC])

cnt==1&&cnt1==0&&cnt2==0;

step.name: 投资银行总部文管审批
投资银行总部职能审批
投资银行总部总经理审批
资本市场部总经理审批
质控二部文管形式审核

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var ret=LB_sqlProcedure("{call JGCRM.PRO_JG_LCFZTH(:state{int},:msg,?,?,?,?)}",[$Login.User,$Login.IP,O_WORKFLOW.InstID,34]);
var r1=ret.get("state");
var r2=ret.get("msg");
ABS_IF(r1>0,1,r2)

condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_FXSSXGSPLC",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_FXSSXGSPLC",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
  true;
}else{
  false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select status from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_FXBGSSPLC') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

step.name: 保荐业务部门负责人审批
保荐业务部门负责人审批
